info.title: Cherophobe
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Cherophobe is a first person shooter with a smile.

This game has an online leaderboard.

Controls:
Analog stick = Move
IR pointer = aim
B button = shoot
A button = stop turning

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com

music (Melancoly) by Grace Valhalla
jamendo.com/en/artist/grace.valhalla/
